description: Wow your friends with this spring roll recipe inspired by the flavours of a cheeseburger. It'll make the perfect finger food for your next party.
keywords: Spring rolls,Air fryer,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Beef,Peanut free
name: Air-Fryer Cheeseburger Spring Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs tomato sauce (save 1 tbs to serve)
2 tbs American mustard (save 1 tbs to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Using hands, combine beef burgers, gherkins, sauce, mustard and cheese in a large bowl.

HowToTip.tipText: Covering rolls with a damp tea towel prevents them drying out.

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 pastry sheet on bench with 1 corner pointing towards you. Place 1 slightly heaped tablespoonful of mince mixture in middle of pastry. Fold corner nearest to you over filling then roll up, folding in sides to enclose filling. Transfer to a tray and cover with a damp tea towel (see Tip). Repeat with remaining pastry sheets and mince mixture to make a total of 20 spring rolls.

Spray air-fryer basket with oil. Place half of the spring rolls in basket and spray with oil. Cook for 15 minutes, turning halfway through cooking, or until golden and crisp. Repeat with remaining spring rolls. Serve spring rolls drizzled with extra tomato sauce and mustard.
